content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Boiler at position(-34.5, 30.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -34.5, 30.0)

### Error Tips

### Errors when placing a pipe
- Ensure there is enough space and no existing objects in the way before attempting to place a pipe. Check the surrounding area for obstructions.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check for existing entities at the target location.
